content: get into the autumn spirit with our fun and festive crochet pumpkin coaster tutorial using my own pumpkin stitch pattern in this step-by-step guide i will show you how to create these adorable pumpkin coasters to add a touch of fall charm to your home whether you re a crochet beginner or seasoned pro this project is perfect for all skill levels grab your crochet hook and yarn and let s get started on this cozy and creative autumn craft
